Welcome to the homepage for the newly formed (est November 2025) Vancouver, BC Canada Chapter of the Society for Conservation GIS.

This group aims to bring together the community of conservation related Geographic Information System (GIS) related individuals across Vancouver and the greater region of southern British Columbia.

Our chapter is an affiliated chapter of the [Society for Conservation GIS (SCGIS)](https://www.scgis.org/ "SCGIS Organization Homepage"). 

The SCGIS helps bring together conservation practitioners and GIS technology by supporting communication and networking, scholarships, and training across the world through a system of connected [chapters](https://www.scgis.org/chapters "Check out other SCGIS chapters around the world!")in various cities and countires. Membership is open to anyone looking to engage in a GIS conservation related community.

# Upcoming Events

As a chapter, we plan to host a mix of events, including:

- Talks from conservation and GIS related groups ([contact us](mailto:scgis.canada.vancouver@gmail.com) if you're interested in presenting)

- Hands-on workshops on topics including data collection/portals, GIS analysis, remote sensing, mapping and data visualization

- Outdoor citizen science and conservation related events
- More casual social meetups including hikes and happy hours



This schedule will be developed and begin in 2026, sign up to our mailing list (above) and follow us on our social media page for updates.
